bike.description: Fuji A2-SL custom-butted alloy w/ PowerCurve down tube, smooth welds, hydroformed top tube, tapered 1 1/8" - 1.5" head tube. Rear triangle: Fuji A2-SL custom-butted alloy monostay w/ hydroformed chainstay, cold-forged dropout, post disc mount and replaceable hanger

components.description: Manitou Marvel 27.5 Comp TS air w/ tapered alloy steerer, MILO lockout, 80mm travel (13"-15") 100mm travel (17"-19")
Shimano Deore XT, M781 SGS Shadow top normal, 10-speed
Formula DC-73 front / Formula DC-30 rear, 32H disc hubs, Vera Terra DPD22 rims
Hayes Dyno Comp, hydraulic disc, 180/160mm rotor
Oval M100, alloy riser bar, 9° sweep, 31.8mm diameter, 680mm wide, 15mm rise
Oval M313, 3D-forged alloy, 31.8mm clamp diameter, 6° rise
Oval Womens W200 w/ steel rails
Oval M300, alloy double-bolt micro-adjust, 31.6mm x 350mm
